name: Postpox
description:
After great pox epidemic civilization has divided- some live in the cities, behind big walls, trying not to let anyone in, but those not so lucky formed communities, trying to defend themselves against bandits and zombies. You are one of these people, living in the village. But soon your life will turn upside down. 

Controls in town view:

  • Left click to move
  • Right click to interact
  • I - Inventory
  • C- Character
  • J- Quest log
  • H- Heal yourself by clicking on bandage icon
  • Left shift Hold it to sprint

Controls in fight mode:

  • Left click  to damage enemy
  • 1 - heal yourself (unlocks at level 2)
  • 2- buck shot (unlocks at level 4)
  • 3- Napalm death, deals massive damage to all enemies (unlocks at level 6)
